description: Avoid instructions that rely only on sensory characteristics like color or position.
recommendation: Use text instructions that do not depend on color or position alone. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.3.3,1.4.1)
algorithm: Searches text for sensory words (color/position/shape) used with instruction verbs and flags potential sensory-only instructions.
algorithm_advanced: Extracts document text (excluding script/style) and flags sensory-word matches when paired with instruction verbs.
